info.name: pytest-himark
info.summary: A plugin that reads a config.json file in your test root directory, searches the 'markers' key, lists the markers declared as 'true' as enabled markers and automatically adds -m option to the command line with an OR on the enabled markers.

info.name: pytest-himark
info.summary: A plugin that will filter pytest's test collection using a json file. It will read a json file provided with a --json argument in pytest command line (or in pytest.ini), search the markers key and automatically add -m option to the command line for filtering out the tests marked with disabled markers.

info.summary: This plugin aims to create markers automatically based on a json configuration.
